title: Fabio Ayaipoma’s CV
text:
Business Analytics Student BYUI

fabiomayaipoma@gmail.com www.linkedin.com/in/fabio-ayaipoma



Growing in data + analytics


Data analysis, financial reporting, Excel automation, Power BI dashboards, SQL querying, customer service, and event operations.



Business intelligence, process optimization, sustainable initiatives, financial modeling, operations, and data-driven decision-making.




September 2024 - December 2028
Brigham Young University–Idaho, Rexburg Bachelor of Science in Business Analytics



Jan 2025 – July 2025
Ticket Usher, Brigham Young University–Idaho
Improved guest entry flow by 40% by reorganizing check-in procedures with fellow ushers.
Resolved ticket issues for 150+ attendees per event, reducing patron complaints by 60%.
Supported a team of 8+ in managing crowd flow and ensuring safety compliance at major events.
May 2023 – Sept 2023
Accounting Intern, Studio Matteria, Lima, Peru
Cut reporting time by 30% through automated reconciliation formulas in Excel.
Recovered 5% of the operating budget after identifying misclassified expenses.
Delivered weekly financial summaries for leadership to support budget planning.
